justification: The Offering provides an inspirational statement, 'Even the smallest person can change the course of the future,' which does not relate to automated configuration or coordination of systems. The Interfaces mention non-technical items, 'wooden leg and hook for a hand,' with no relevance to system integration or workflow automation. There is no evidence or description supporting the required ability for coordinating complex digital workflows.
ability: The ability to coordinate the automated configuration, management, and coordination of  systems, applications, digital twins and services.
